imdb.title: Mob Psycho 100
imdb.plot: A psychic middle school boy tries to live a normal life and keep his growing powers under control, even though he constantly gets into trouble.

episodes.title: Future ~Career Paths~
episodes.plot: Salt Middle School has given students, including Mob, a task to write down what their career path and future looks like. However, Mob seems to have a problem as he doesn't know what he wants while everyone else seems to have some idea of what their future looks like. Meanwhile, the mysterious giant broccoli tree, called Divine Tree, is still standing in the middle of Seasoning City and some people have formed a Psycho Helmet Religion around it.

episodes.title: Yokai Hunter Amakusa Haruaki Appears! ~The Threat of a Hundred Demons!!~
episodes.plot: Salt Middle School has tasked their students to prepare for a cultural fair. At the same time yokai hunter Haruaki Amakusa has made his appearance and seeks help from Reigen in defeating the evil yokai horde called the Hundred Demons to stop them from resurrecting the Great Yokai King.

episodes.title: Getting Carried Away ~100%~
episodes.plot: Mob started to feel that girls are looking at him, and this causes him to think that he is starting to become popular. Dimple believes that it's just misunderstanding and asked mob to become a founder of Psycho Helmet Cult.

episodes.title: Divine Tree 1 ~The Founder Appears~
episodes.plot: All of Seasoning City has become brainwashed by the Psycho Helmet Cult. Mob and Reigen rush to destroy the Divine Tree while Teru discovers the identity of the cult's leader.

episodes.title: Divine Tree 2 ~Peace~
episodes.plot: Mob finally confronts the one responsible for the people's strange behaviors and obsession towards the Divine Tree and Psycho Helmet Religion. However, he first has to face off Teruki, who has been brainwashed by Psycho Helmet.

episodes.title: Divine Tree 3 ~Dimple Is~
episodes.plot: Mob's attitude seems to change once he hears what Dimple says. Mob ends up apologizing to Dimple because he had gotten carried away from the thought of being popular and didn't hear what Dimple had to tell him before.

episodes.title: Transmission 1 ~Winter Break~
episodes.plot: Kurata Tome has always dreamed about communicating with the universe through telepathy. However, as winter break comes closer and closer, she makes the decision to disband the Telepathy Club.

episodes.title: Transmission 2 ~Encountering the Unknown~
episodes.plot: The group somehow finally makes it to the summit of Mt. Mudboat. Takenaka had been up all night reading all the texts about UFOS and the Telepathy Club comes together to send a telepathic message into Space, but there is no UFO in sight.

episodes.title: Mob 1 ~Moving~
episodes.plot: When Shigeo receives the news that Tsubomi will be moving away very soon, he goes to his friends for advice on how to confess.

episodes.title: Mob 2 ~Rival~
episodes.plot: On his way to meeting Tsubomi, Mob is caught in an accident.

episodes.title: Mob 3 ~Trauma~
episodes.plot: As Shigeo slowly rampages across the city, more of his friends attempt to stop his outburst.

episodes.title: Confession ~The Future~
episodes.plot: While Shigeo gets closer to his final destination where Tsubomi awaits him, Reigen tries to reach his student to tell him something important.

episodes.title: Ripped Apart ~Someone Is Watching~
episodes.plot: Mob is still trying to lead an ordinary daily life, but the people around him do not allow it and try to get him out of his comfort zone with disastrous results.

episodes.title: Urban Legends ~Encountering Rumors~
episodes.plot: Reigen looks for new ways to get some money and decides that urban legends are what will take him out of poverty once and for all.

episodes.title: One Danger After Another ~Degeneration~
episodes.plot: Reigen sets up an official homepage for his Spirits and Such Consultation Office and he immediately starts to get jobs left and right, including a middle-aged man asking Reigen to curse someone and a woman who's being haunted by a ghost. As he was listening to their problems, Mob realizes something. Why do people treat humans and spirits so differently? Meanwhile, Reigen gets another request from a group of college students that want to take a photo at a haunted location, but.

episodes.title: Inside ~Evil Spirit~
episodes.plot: Reigen and Mob receive a new job. This time, their client is a wealthy man named Asagiri Masashi. He's not just rich, but super rich, so Reigen and Mob head to his mansion only to find other self-proclaimed psychics there as well. One of the psychics there happens to include the president of the Rising Sun Spiritual Union, Jodo Kirin. The job is apparently to exorcise the evil spirit that is apparently possessing his daughter, Minori.

episodes.title: Discord ~Choices~
episodes.plot: Mob gets trapped inside a parallel world created by Mogami Keiji. Minori ends up transferring to his class, and Mob becomes the target of bullying. He can't ask anyone for help, and his negative emotions start to build inside. The truth behind the tragedy that Mogami went through when he was alive comes to light. Meanwhile, Reigen and the others were waiting for Mob to regain consciousness back at the Asagiri mansion. Dimple attempts to save Mob by infiltrating Minori's body.

episodes.title: Poor, Lonely, Whitey
episodes.plot: Reigen's loneliness pushes him to achieve even more than ever before without Mob after realising he doesn't have any friends.

episodes.title: Cornered ~True Identity~
episodes.plot: After splitting up with Mob, Reigen starts doing a lot of the jobs on his own. He then gets an offer to appear on a TV program. Reigen is ecstatic and accepts the offer, but this was all a trap set by Jodo Kirin, the president of the Rising Sun Spiritual Union. Jodo corners him during the live filming of the show and the fact that Reigen is a fraud comes to light. Reigen gets bashed from all sides and ends up having to hold a press conference.

episodes.title: Even Then ~Continue Forward~
episodes.plot: The day for the annual marathon and Salt Middle School was drawing nearer. Mob proclaims that if he places in the top 10 he'll tell Tsubomi how he feels about her. Everyone around him cheers Mob on and he starts training hard every day until the day of the event. Meanwhile, Tsubomi and her friend Miki go to Reigen's Spirits and Such Consultation Office with a request. Ritsu happened to be at the office, helping out in Mob's absence, but he hears Tsubomi say something rather surprising.

episodes.title: Show Me What You've Got ~Band Together~
episodes.plot: While The Claw makes their schemes public, Reigen forms a defense team.

episodes.title: Collision ~Power Type~
episodes.plot: The boss of the Claw, Suzuki Toichiro barricades himself into Seasoning City Culture Tower after declaring war on the world. After instantly getting rid of the police barriers, they make their next move.

episodes.title: Guidance ~Psychic Sensor~
episodes.plot: The total offensive of the psychics who want to defeat Claw has begun, but the Supercives are really powerful and will give them more than one problem.

episodes.title: The Battle for Social Rehabilitation ~Friendship~
episodes.plot: Three years ago, Serizawa was troubled with about his psychic powers. One day, he was visited by the boss, Suzuki Toichiro. Serizawa ends up trusting him since he's the first person to understand what he's going through.

episodes.title: Boss Fight ~The Final Light~
episodes.plot: The conclusion of the final fight and the start and reinvigoration of numerous relationships.

episodes.title: Self-Proclaimed Psychic: Reigen Arataka ~And Mob~
episodes.plot: Espers fight with supernatural phenomena that can't be explained by science. Reigen Arataka, who runs the Spirits and Such Consultation Office, is one of those psychics--well, a fake one. His only hope is a dull middle schooler named Mob.

episodes.title: Doubts About Youth ~The Telepathy Club Appears~
episodes.plot: The Telepathy Club wants Mob to join them to avoid being disbanded for not having enough members but Reigen wants Mob to focus on his job instead.

episodes.title: An Invite to a Meeting ~Simply Put, I Just Want to Be Popular~
episodes.plot: During Body Improvement Club practice, Mob faints and is left in the club room to recover. The Telepathy Club comments that Mob will never be popular even if he trains his body.

episodes.title: Idiots Only Event ~Kin~
episodes.plot: During the cold open, delinquents from Salt Middle School are in a turf war with a rival school. When the rival delinquents are unable to win, they call for their leader, Teruki "Teru" Hanazawa. In spite of being physically unimposing, Teru disposes of the Salt delinquents with ease.

episodes.title: Ochimusha ~Psychic Powers and Me~
episodes.plot: Mob has promised not to use his powers ever again on humans, but a new psychic; Teru, appears. Will Mob use his powers or refuse the duel?

episodes.title: Discord ~To Become One~
episodes.plot: The president of the Telepathy Club asks Mob to help her find other espers. And a mysterious man talks to Ritsu mistaking him for his older brother Mob.

episodes.title: Exaltation ~I've Obtained Loss~
episodes.plot: Ritsu meets Dimple who teaches him how to use his new-found powers as thugs from other schools try to find and beat the one responsible for Hanazawa's defeat.

episodes.title: The Older Brother Bows ~Destructive Intent~
episodes.plot: After Ritsu stirs up trouble with his new found psychic powers, a new psychic; Koyoma, is sent by Claw to capture him

episodes.title: "Claw" ~7th Division~
episodes.plot: Mob and Teru leave to rescue the kidnapped kids from Claw as Ritsu and the others try to escape on their own.

episodes.title: The Heinous Aura ~Mastermind~
episodes.plot: All the Scars are sent after Mob and Teru as Ritsu and the others continue their escape.

episodes.title: Master ~Leader~
episodes.plot: The captured Mob and Ritsu reunite at last. Reigen arrives at the base and is peculiarly friendly with the guards.

episodes.title: Mob and Reigen ~A Giant Tsuchinoko Appears~
episodes.plot: As Reigen tries to convince Mob to not use his powers against the Scars, something unexpected happens to him.
